label: Farm Size (ha)
Description: Total cultivated area under cocoa production in hectares

label: Dry Year Incidence (probability)
Description: Likelihood of experiencing a dry year affecting cocoa yield

label: Dry Year Damage (yield loss fraction)
Description: Estimated fraction of yield lost due to dry years

label: Heavy Rainfall Incidence (probability)
Description: Probability of excessive rainfall during the season

label: Heavy Rainfall Damage (yield loss or multiplier)
Description: Loss or increased disease risk from heavy rain

label: Cocoa Pest and Disease Incidence (probability)
Description: Frequency of pest and disease occurrence

label: Cocoa Pest and Disease Damage (yield loss fraction)
Description: Yield loss caused by pests and diseases

label: Labor Price (CFA/month/person)
Description: Monthly wage per worker in CFA

label: Full-time Labor (persons)
Description: Number of full-time workers employed year-round

label: Seasonal Labor (persons)
Description: Number of workers hired during harvest season

label: Fertilizer Cost (CFA/kg)
Description: Price per kilogram of fertilizer in CFA

label: Fertilizer Amount (kg)
Description: Quantity of fertilizer applied (kg)

label: Pesticide Cost (CFA)
Description: Total cost of pesticide treatments based on farm size

label: Pesticide Frequency (treatments/year)
Description: Number of pesticide applications per year

label: Family Labor Cost (CFA/year)
Description: Estimated value of unpaid family labor annually

label: Cocoa Harvest (kg)
Description: Total annual cocoa yield (based on farm size)

label: World Market Cocoa Price (CFA/kg)
Description: Global price of cocoa in CFA per kg

label: Farmgate Price Share (fraction of world price)
Description: Portion of global price received by farmers

label: pesticide efficiency
Description: pesticide application effect on yield

label: rain effect on pest pressure
Description: pest incidence increase after rain

label: fertilizer effect on yield
Description: fertilizer effect on yield

label: density of trees on farm
Description: NA

label: diameter growth per tree per year
Description: NA

label: height increase per tree per year
Description: NA

label: tree survival rate upon establishment
Description: NA

label: price that farmers could receive per m(3) at farmgate
Description: NA

label: price for seedlings
Description: NA

label: price for transport and gas
Description: NA

label: personnel for establishment labor per ha
Description: NA

label: yield reduction by timber trees to cocoa
Description: NA

label: material for harvest
Description: NA

label: personnel for harvest of timber
Description: NA
